mapper.select: SELECT ob.ob_num, nb.nb_image, CONCAT(ob_grade_alpha(ob.ob_grade), nb.nb_title) nb_title, nb.nb_writer, nb.nb_publisher, TO_CHAR(nb_publi_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') nb_publi_date , ob.ob_sell_price FROM newbook nb, oldbook ob WHERE nb.nb_num = ob.nb_num AND nb.nb_num = #{nb_num} AND ob.ob_status = 3
